options.content:
{{#each data}} {{/each}}
Titel Sophora ID Visits
{{this.content_titel}} {{this.content_id_sophora}} {{this.visits}}
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  content_titel,content_id_sophora, sum(m_visits) as visits 
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      --publishing_date,
      FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
      FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
      m_visits,
      m_page_loads,
      FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER ( PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel
    FROM
      `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.articles_joined_${dataset_zeitraum:raw}`
    WHERE
      site_level2 = '${app_name}'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
      AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
      AND (
        CASE 
            WHEN "$LRA" = 'NDR' THEN
                content_titel NOT LIKE '%Video Livestream%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%Startteaser%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%startteaser%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%-Anmelden%'
            AND content_titel NOT LIKE '%_Start'
            AND content_titel != 'Anmelden'
            AND content_titel != 'Jetzt l√§uft'
        ELSE
          TRUE
        END)
      AND date = ${bq_today:doublequote}
  )
GROUP BY
  content_id_sophora,
  content_titel,
  publishing_date
ORDER BY
  3 DESC
LIMIT
  14
